mapper.select: select v.*, u.* from COM_VIDEO v left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID=v.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE=0 where v.VIDEO_ID=#{id} and v.IS_DELETE=0
mapper.insert: insert into COM_VIDEO(video_title, video_name, video_decription, video_view_count, video_upload_time, user_id, rela_type, rela_id) values (#{title},#{name},#{description},#{viewCount},#{uploadTime},#{user.id},#{relaType},#{relaId})
mapper.update: update COM_VIDEO set VIDEO_TITLE=#{title}, VIDEO_DECRIPTION=#{description}, VIDEO_VIEW_COUNT=#{viewCount} where VIDEO_ID=#{id}
update COM_VIDEO set IS_DELETE=1, IS_DELETE_TIME=now() where VIDEO_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select VIDEO_ID from COM_VIDEO where VIDEO_ID=#{id}
